website_summaries.verdict: Arms is the fast-paced multiplayer game the Switch needed. Hopefully Nintendo will soon beef it up with extra content.
pros: Starts easy but gets extremely challenging
Great character design and fresh ideas
Online play is fast and fun
Works well with buttons or with Joy-Con motion controls
cons: Not as many game modes as other similarly priced premium games

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad game, but don't pay $60 for it
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun when played with multiple people. There is not much for content, and it gets repetitive after a few matches. In the end, it is a fun game that was played a few times, but now it just sits there. I don't think it is worth $60, in my opinion it has about $30 worth of content, and low replayability.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty cool and fun. My kids really enjoy playing it. I haven't played it with them, but I have watched them play. They laugh a lot! The arms the characters have are on long springs and reach a long way. All the way to the other person's character. There are a variety of different arms to choose from. This is a 4 player game, and it's like a boxing game. My kids are teenagers and they love playing it!
customer_reviews.author: oliveoil

customer_reviews.title: ... game mechanics are fundamentally sound and the game is fun to play with friends and family and ranked mode
customer_reviews.text: The game mechanics are fundamentally sound and the game is fun to play with friends and family and ranked mode. The downside though is that the game doesn't have much going for it other than the above mentioned features. If either one of those modes sound like fun to you then you will love Arms but don't look for a great story and the party modes are okay at best.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Essig

customer_reviews.title: I love this game.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a lot of fun with it. The characters, music, and gameplay are fantastic. If anyone is wondering, you don't have to use motion controls. It works just fine in handheld mode, with the Pro controller, and with the joycon grip.
customer_reviews.author: Slowpokebro

customer_reviews.title: Game is great; faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that the game itself is great. My kids love it. However, less than 2 weeks after they got it, the card has stopped working. They got it for Easter and I ordered it 2 weeks before Easter, so we are outside the return window and can't get it replaced, but they can't play it either. $45 for 2 weeks of play is NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lanwenyi

customer_reviews.title: my kids love this. They yell and giggle in glee as ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, my kids love this. They yell and giggle in glee as they fight each other, AI, or online opponents in a non-lethal, well designed but not humorless arena. That was the whole point. Until further notice (and on behalf of my progeny), I love this!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Like spring man says, "it's like totally rad".
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my younger brother as a gift. He likes the story and the game play mechanics of this game. He also likes the design, the characters themselves, and the gloves that they use. He says there is nothing that he dislikes about the game and that it is good as it is. Would definitely recommend to other Nintendo Switch users!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if this game would be great or not for our family. But it quickly beat out even Mario Kart 8 Deluxe as a family favorite for our 4 and 6 year olds and my wife and me. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game that has more layers than you think
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game that has more layers than you think. It's more than a tech demo that the previews make it look like. Nintendo keeps pushing out new content for it and makes game balancing adjustments as time goes on. I recommend picking this up if Splatoon 2 isn't your cup of tea or you need a break from it. (Spoiler alert: Splatoon 2 is MUCH better).
customer_reviews.author: Marty Bushway

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this game
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this game. It was not that fun. Wave your arms around wildly and you may find a victory. Each match just seems the same to me
customer_reviews.author: Sean Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun online and local--great for exercise
customer_reviews.text: Fun online and local--great for exercise This game is great for the social isolation time. Fun to exercise and compete with local (i.e. the fam) and online. Good exercise and great stress relief. Light years better than fitness boxing.
customer_reviews.author: The bookish health nut

customer_reviews.title: Fun-Packed Adrenaline Rush
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on fighting games, and I definitely was't sure I would enjoy ARMS. However, when I started playing, I couldn't stop. This game is a blast to play (especially in local 2-person co-op), and Nintendo is constantly pushing out updates to the game - for example, customizable controls! My only complaint is that 1v1v1 matches are usually determined by initial placement and luck, since two people can gang up on the third.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Me and my wife love playing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Me and my wife love playing it and it's a hit with anyone trying it. I brought it over with my switch for a family reunion and all the kids were freaking out wanting to play it. Absolutely amazing and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome new game from Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Solid game, I'm really enjoying this new I.P. from Nintendo... It's a step in the right direction and offers something different than your typical fighting game. The gameplay is smooth, fun and easy to pick up and play assuming to play on the easiest difficulty. As you increased the game's difficulty it goes from a casual fighter to a game that requires technique. Make sure you support this game because it's only going to get better... Oh, and did I forget to mention that each fighter is unique and more characters will be added as free DLC.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Underrated Gem
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game, and they just keep adding more and more content. Really different type of fighting game, leave it to Nintendo to come up with crazy amazing ideas like this, this is a very underrated gem on the Nintendo Switch. Would love to get a tournament goin with a bunch of friends in the same room
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steeves

customer_reviews.title: Sprained my wrist playing, still pretty fun
customer_reviews.text: When playing this game, which is loads of fun btw, be cautious that when using the "thumbs-up grip" for prolonged periods of time as you may encounter obtrusive wrist pain. Also, there is a harsh difficulty curve; I am having trouble defeating the level 4 AI and many online players. But the bottom line still stands, watch your wrists or you may be out of commission for a while like me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Came in superb condition!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, there weren't any flaws whatsoever in the packaging. The game is fun to play. I recommend if you want to play it using motion controls you get more than 2 Joycons. Controls where easy to learn,and it was fun to play with friends and family! :>
customer_reviews.author: Kabbyage

customer_reviews.title: Too basic a game for the price
customer_reviews.text: The game is not worth $60 in my opinion, it is a very shallow game in the sense that there isn't much to the game but unlocking characters (not even a dozen characters) and boxing it out. The controls are a bit weird at first but quickly get used to it, it isn't a bad game, but it certainly isn't worth its price, either.
customer_reviews.author: Lenix.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good, useable condition which doesn’t seem to be the norm with my past few orders of other merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cool game
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are amazing. My son is having so much fun playing this on his switch and he is getting a little exercise too. The two person mode works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!! A must have Switch game.
customer_reviews.text: Not just a simple fight game. So many modes and so much strategy is involved. Seems like more people joining ranked and online battles every week. These battles get as intense as Splatoon, we even recognized alot of Squid references in the usernames. This is a must have in your game collection.
customer_reviews.author: QASE

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best fighting games ever in my opinion. The use of motion controls feels very natural, and adds to the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great game; one of my top 3
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game...hilarious, fun, strategic. Very good time. My 3rd fav behind Mario and Zelda.
customer_reviews.author: rickuski

customer_reviews.title: Okay game
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite game. This game is not that fun if playing alone or even with someone else. It gets boring pretty quickly. If you want to get a game that’s similar Super Smash Bros is definitely a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: Simple Fighting Game
customer_reviews.text: ARMS is very easy to get into. The focus isn't really on combos, but on reading your opponent. It's not very fun by yourself, but it's a decent multiplayer game. There's no other good 4-player fighter on the switch yet, so this might be a fun distraction every now and then for groups.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Nintendo Switch game, different type of arms and abilitys plus the free DLC. Best to use is the joy con motion controller makes it the game better but after difficulty Level 5 gets very hard to play
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Unique, but there are better multiplayer experiences on the Switch
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of content for a full-priced multiplayer game. Definitely better options, but still provides some unique fun. Came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: teekaymizzle

customer_reviews.title: I can see how some people would like this game
customer_reviews.text: I can see how some people would like this game, but I could not get behind the repetitiveness. I traded this in about 2 months after receiving. Thankfully I got my money nearly fully back in trading in.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thomas

customer_reviews.title: and I have enjoyed it as well
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old loves this game, and I have enjoyed it as well. We have logged over 100 hours on it easily so far.
customer_reviews.author: V. Nebling

customer_reviews.title: Not for first time gamers
customer_reviews.text: My son was obsessed with getting this game for his birthday... he played it for a few days before being moving on to another game. If you have younger children they might not be able to keep up with this game...
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but it's overpriced and you can't chose ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but it's overpriced and you can't chose the mode you want to play online.. the game randomly chose it for you
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game with awesome characters. A lot of fun to be had with this game!
customer_reviews.author: KiryuDojima

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping. Exactly as described. Item was very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Esco

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, high quality, fast paced game. Your kids will love it. There are short matches so no huge time investment required.
customer_reviews.author: WVphotog

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this game. It gets them up and moving! Just be sure they use the safety loops on the controllers before playing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for 1-4 people
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I prefer turning off the motion controls but super fun to play by yourself or with/against a friend locally.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Fun with friends!
customer_reviews.text: For what it is it's great. It's just not a game you can invest your time into.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Elbert Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Ages10-13. I'm sure adults like it too.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun! My kids as well as my husband love playing this game. Our family has had a blast playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun game, the online plays well with not lag
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game, the online plays well with not lag, solid title for fighting fans on the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun game and you can get a great arm workout ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game and you can get a great arm workout when played using the remotes as the sensors in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kamille

customer_reviews.title: An okay party game
customer_reviews.text: Hard to really jump into, you just flail your arms and hope things connect. I picked it up with high hopes when it came out and was disappointed. It has yet to be played again since. A party game of randomly trying to hit your opponent by thrusting your arms might be fun, but this is not a serious competitive game.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Kids played it one night and it wouldn’t play anymore the next day sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Sue Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Their both seven and are having a fun time with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my grandkids and from what I hear it's interesting enough to hold their attention which I was hoping for. Their both seven and are having a fun time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz Wubbles

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game. Not a huge learning curve to have fun, but a bit of a curve to be really good. Good for all ages. My 7 and 10 year olds love it.
customer_reviews.author: newlinux

customer_reviews.title: Product received was a box and cartridge marked for sale in Australia.
customer_reviews.text: As a shopper in USA I wasn’t expecting an Australian copy of the game to be sent. I know Switch isn’t region locked, but you never know if a future firmware update can change that. If I ever get rid of it I’d rather not worry if US vs AUS versions would affect value.
customer_reviews.author: PKC

customer_reviews.title: Packaged chewed up when arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what happened, but the game had been chewed up by (assuming a dog) the case and package was all chewed up. It smelled like a dog when pulled it out of my mailbox. For spending that much money on a game and it coming in that kind of shape is just sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This game is great for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome. My kids want to play it all the time. This game is very addictin.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Popular gift with adolescents
customer_reviews.text: It made my grandson happy. That is the highest praise I can give it, having never actually played with a Nintendo myself. Recommended, for grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Portista

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game and easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like beating crap out of people and not even feeling sore the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Crone

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, but don't overpay
customer_reviews.text: I was watching for game deals on Amazon, when Arms popped up for $43. It is a very fun game, but only if you have people to play with! Wait for the price to drop a little to try it out because it isn't a game that you'll find yourself obsessed with. But it's fun to play every now and again with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and creative new IP. With a whole bunch of free dlc on the way, this game is beyond worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Arms
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how the game would be, but my son really enjoys it especially the character Min Min.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dem

customer_reviews.title: FUN and interactive
customer_reviews.text: Kids and parents alike like this game, it keeps you moving and it's FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, difficult controls, but after a couple of rounds you get used to the sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Like!
customer_reviews.text: This game has great reach and has lots of great features and fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Horrible gave me the wrong game. I opened my package and opened the box grabbed the game and put it in the switch. When I load the game it isn't arms but instead a game called 88 heros with the sticker of the official game I bought which was arms. I'm extremely upset about this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Buy this game
customer_reviews.text: I hate people slept on this game. Picture punch out making sweet love to power stone and this is they’re love child.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game with different ways to play it. Family friendly so everyone can play.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: my review
customer_reviews.text: good game to play with friend and on a party, so much fun
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Great game but docking a star because the controlls are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game but docking a star because the controlls are hard to get used to & the instructions are not very clear on how to use the different controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla K

customer_reviews.title: Its Alright but has Huge Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It's fun for a bit. Online play kinda sucks though people with a bad connection have a clear advantage and certain characters are blatantly better than others. Due to lack of real single player story of any sort online play is all there is. Some matches are great some are cancerous. 60$ hell no pick up used for no more than 30$
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two boys (ages 11 & 12) They have loved this game.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Slack

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game. But I guess Nintendo stopped creating new characters so there’s no new characters in the update now. But it’s still a different game to play.
customer_reviews.author: Stamparoo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Not great. But you'll have a good time with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Game.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, just a good game to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cypig

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid fighting game. Full price was a hard choice for me, but it's definitely worth it. There adding new fighters and content.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan lambert

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This game is lots of fun! It can be addictive
customer_reviews.author: very happy

customer_reviews.title: It's cool in concept but couldn't quite hook me
customer_reviews.text: I tried. It's cool in concept but couldn't quite hook me. Not huge into fighting games in general so that could easily be a factor. Just overall didn't have that much fun with it so I'm giving Splatoon a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Tricky,but very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I think this game is pretty hard to get around at first,but after a while it gets really fun,especially in online! Excited to see the updates this game has to offer!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Fun party game
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun game, though there isn't a ton of depth to it. In reality, it is better suited for multiple people. Think of the wii on steroids with this one. Not a bad workout if you're like me and have bad cardio! EDIT: A few months later, I play ARMS less than any other. Not something I would play alone, very repetitive. But, I stick with the original review, with it being a better party game (if your guests are into that kind of thing).
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. This game definitely fell under the radar. The local multiplayer is awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best switch game!! A must have 1-2 players....great immediate fun!

customer_reviews.title: So good, I completely did not expect this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic game, highly recommended and a BLAST TO PLAY!

customer_reviews.title: No game inside
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the item timely however on Christmas I gave this to my grandson and when he opened it no game was inside like others that reviewed this game. Very embarrassing and a disappointed child on Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was not a digital download it was a fully fledged physical copy

customer_reviews.text: My two boys love playing this game. They love the different power ups and enjoy virtually beating each other up. 🤣

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game the whole family can play, even the five year old.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game it's energetic, competitive and has fun characters.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game and good to play with others! New style of game that is refreshing and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan tsao

customer_reviews.title: A very fun online / couch multiplayer game.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very solid game! It plays more like an arena shooter but with fighting game mechanics. Truly a unique game! Nintendo will be releasing free dlc in the coming months, which is a nice bonus. The online is one of the smoothest experiences I've ever had with a fighting game. If you are looking for a deep single player experience you might be disappointed, but playing online is so much fun it makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeldalov3r94

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this game is pretty awesome. I also like that it at least involves some physical activity for my 11 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game, but replay value isn’t quite there for me.

customer_reviews.title: Practice practice!
customer_reviews.text: New take on fighting games. Pretty cool and interesting with all the different characters and ways to customize them. Works your ARMS too 😂

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game - bought for kids but adults can play too.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad game. I wish biff actually announced during gameplay.

customer_reviews.text: The seller had the same cover, same cartridge label as ARMS. But when I put it in my switch the game is actually HAS BEEN HEROES. I am extremely disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: It's really fun, until you play for about 100 hours. Then you either love it due to ranking, or just get bored of how repetitive it gets.

product_meta.title: ARMS - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo Switch| Edition:StandardChoose a fighting champion from around the world, equip your own combination of extendable arms, and then use a mix of button presses and quick hand motions to really take the fight to your opponent. Throw punches and guide them mid-flight to hit agile fighters, avoid incoming attacks with dashes, or trampoline high into the air to rain down fists from above. Power-up your punches to deal extra damage or curve your fists around obstacles to hit skittish opponents. Fill up your special gauge to dish out devastating combinations and finish them off. Unleash your inner fighter in this unbelievable sporting event! Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online play. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/switch-online​
feature_bullets: Fight via simple motion and button controls
Select from a variety of fighters
Fight in arenas with unique obstacles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,180 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
